name: Necrozma - Combat Form
description: he was born into a noble family. trained his family to learn magic with water element. hopes to be able to help the drought-stricken region. he managed to master that magic as a child. But his curiosity about magic is getting bigger, he is challenged to learn high level magic with the element of darkness. his personality began to change slowly, high-level magic required a great sacrifice as well. he had to gather the spirits of his fellow races, in the end his family and village were sacrificed for his magic power
